CustomField.formula: IF(Booking_Record_Type__c == "Permanent Pickup/Delivery","Permanent", IF(Booking_Record_Type__c == "Adhoc Pickup/Delivery","Adhoc", IF(Booking_Record_Type__c == "MPB Pickup","Adhoc(MPB)", IF(Booking_Record_Type__c == "Other",Booking_Record_Type__c, IF(Booking_Record_Type__c == "Dependent Delivery" && Booking__r.Parent_Booking__r.RecordType.Name == "Permanent Pickup/Delivery","Permanent","Adhoc"))))) +" - "+Booking_Type__c
CustomField.label: Booking Type
